Classes to run the Groupwise Registrations¶

This page provides documentation of the classes, their attributes and their function which are used to run the groupwise registration

The groupwise registration algorithm works on the principle of applying one rigid, one affine and four multichannel deformable registrations.

Imgs¶

class Classes.Imgs(base_path, batch, no_patients)[source]¶

Initialise the class

param base_path

path to reg_aladin executable (.exe)

param batch

type batch

str

path to floating image (.nii.gz/.nii)

type no_patients

str or []
